entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 09:11 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: NE 29 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain changing to ice pellets or freezing rain this morning. Local ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 this morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 2.
